general_advisory: In paddy crop, areas such as Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are crucial. Water scarcity during these stages can significantly reduce yields. Specific advice is given for crops like Sugarcane, Maize, Tomato, Coconut, Vegetable Seedlings, Fingerlings, Black Gram, Green Gram, Brinjal, Okra, Onion, and Mango.
